
#SiteLabels plugin

##Introduction

This plugin is intended to manage a list of specific labels that can be added to the HTML templates with thetag#dskey{key} and whose valuesâ€‹are editable in **"Managing Site Properties"** .

##Configuration

None

##Usage

For optimal integration, it is possible to complete the resources files: sitelabels_messages_[Locale] toadd labels and help text for the specific keys.
